name: nonreactive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
chemistry
  specialized not often taking part in chemical reactions: Diamond is chemically non-reactive. They developed a new method for transforming the nonreactive gas into ammonia.
biology
  specialized not reacting strongly to stimuli (= things that cause a part of the body to react): Her right eye is nonreactive. The left pupil was enlarged and nonreactive to light.
Nonreactive pans and containers do not contain a metal or other substance that may have a chemical reaction with the food: Cook the chicken in a nonreactive pot. The dish will remain non-reactive as long as the enamel is not scratched.
More examplesFewer examplesMix the ingredients in a nonreactive saucepan and let the mixture stand for thirty minutes.Make sure that you use a pan made of a nonreactive metal.It is important to make acidic sauces in non-reactive pots.
